"Aroma Time Travel": A smart perfume bottle thaticates the time period when the scent was created, allowing the user to experience the fragrance as if they were transported back in time.
"Scent Memory": A perfume bottle that has a built-in memory feature, allowing the user to store different scents and associate them with specific memories.
"Smart Scent Dispenser": A perfume bottle that dispenses scents based on the user's mood or the time of day, using sensors to detect their emotions and preferences.
"Perfume Converter": A perfume bottle that converts different scents into a single, unique fragrance, allowing the user to mix and match their favorite scents.
"Fragrance Diffuser": A perfume bottle that doubles as a fragrance diffuser, dispersing the scent into the air for a more immersive and intense experience.
